title: Google Sheets API Merge Cells Operation Response Schema
description: Schema representing the output of the Merge Cells operation in Google Sheets API

payload.description: The response from a batch update request

spreadsheetId.description: The spreadsheet the updates were applied to

responses.description: The reply of the updates. This maps 1:1 with the requests

mergeCells.description: The result of the merging operation

startRowIndex.description: The start row (inclusive) of the range

endRowIndex.description: The end row (exclusive) of the range

startColumnIndex.description: The start column (inclusive) of the range

endColumnIndex.description: The end column (exclusive) of the range

statusCode.description: HTTP status code of the API response
